text:
The 24th Annual Screen Actor's Guild Awards are upon us, with film and television's most elite actors being honoured at tonight's ceremony at the Shrine Auditorium in Los Angeles.

The ceremony, which is being aired on TV for the very first time, will be hosted by The Good Place star Kristen Bell. Before we get to the awards and the moving speeches, however, we've got the red carpet to look forward to!

See all the best red carpet arrivals below...
title: SAG Awards 2018: Best Dressed On The Red Carpet

meta_data.description: The 24th Annual Screen Actor's Guild Awards are upon us, with film and television's most elite actors being honoured at tonight's ceremony at the Beverly Hilton Hotel in Los Angeles.
